column4: ive just dragged the folder to the cd shud it work now to install 7.10?
well ima giv it a go with anny luck ill b on ubuntu 7.10 in a bit
you should have a file named <filename>.iso  you need to burn that  .iso file as a image in the burning software.  that will burn you a bootable disc
what did not work?  if you just drag/dropped that folder and had it burn, that will not work.  the file you want to burn should be .iso file
